children.label: 1. Authenticate to the API in order to get the session token. The token will be saved internally in the app and used for all other API calls.
children.name: label5

children.label: 2. Manage certificates in the local database. All newly created certificates are added to the local DB first. Use Sync (p. 3) in order to get them to the server.
children.name: label7

children.label: 3. Now review the list of certificates stored locally.
children.name: label8

children.label: 4. And finally sync the certs to the server. All images are uploaded to S3, the data is put into MongoDB. All the new items on the servers are downloaded to the client.
children.name: label9

children.label: Fill in all the fields to be able to synchronize certificates
children.name: label19

children.label: Fill in all the fields to be able to synchronize certificates
children.name: label15
